items.strItemDescription: The salty, sea wind rushes around this weapon. Crafted for all pirates during TLaPD.
This be th' perfect weapon to be fightin' off ninja's with!
Arrr, me mateys! Celebrate TLaPD in true pirate style!
Arrr, me mateys! Celebrate TLaPD in true pirate style!
Squawk! This is the perfect pet for land-lubbers or sea-dogs alike! Watch as a flurry of foliage is flung at your opponents as Parrrrrotical Pete the Parrot pet defends you!
Arrrrrr! It be a pet that won't soil your shoulder, but it might fling something unpleasant.
This be th' perfect weapon to be fightin' off ninja's with!
The salty, sea wind rushes around this weapon. Crafted for all pirates during TLaPD.
